content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Trend Vision One public APIs available to retrieve email assets December 13, 2024—You can now use the Trend Vision One RESTful APIs to get managed email accounts, email domains, and email servers from Email Asset Inventory. For more information, see Trend Vision One Automation Center. Email and Collaboration Security → Email Asset Inventory © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Trend Vision One public APIs available to retrieve email assets
